Body:
"""
        Make sure the various optimize flags do not cause a heart attack.
        """
with self.freshenDatabase() as db:
    db.optimize(purge=True)
with self.freshenDatabase() as db:
    db.optimize(opt=True)
with self.freshenDatabase() as db:
    db.optimize()
    self.assertRaises(NotImplementedError, db.sync)
